subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Takayuki Terauchi drove in the winning run in the bottom of the seventh inning as the Yomiuri Giants beat the Rakuten Eagles, 6-5, to even the best-of-seven Japan Series at two games each.
snippet: Takayuki Terauchi drove in the winning run in the bottom of the seventh inning as the Yomiuri Giants beat the Rakuten Eagles, 6-5, to even the best-of-seven Japan Series at two games each.
